Package com.github.cyberryan1.netunoapi.models.time

Class NDuration

java.lang.Object
com.github.cyberryan1.netunoapi.models.time.NDuration
public class NDuration extends Object
Represents a length of time, such as 5 minutes, 12 seconds, 5 hours, etc. Can support any unit of time up to weeks.

Formatted strings look like: "12 hours", "6 days", or "1 minute".
Unformatted strings look like: "12h", "6d", or "1m".
Timestamp lengths are the number of seconds a length represents. For example, 43200 = 12 hours, 518400 = 6 days, and 60 = 1 minute.

Units Supported: s || seconds, m || minutes, h || hours, d || days, w || weeks

    • asFullLength

      public String asFullLength()
      Converts the timestamp length into a full formatted length string.
      Example: 3600 = "1 hour", 259203 = "3 days and 3 seconds", "3729" = "1 hour, 2 minutes, and 9 seconds", "forever" = "Forever", "108201" = "1 day, 6 hours, 3 minutes, and 21 seconds"
      Returns:
      The formatted length string

    • fullLength

      public String fullLength()
      Alias for the asFormatted() method.
      Returns:
      The full formatted length string

    • isForever

      public boolean isForever()
      Returns:
      True if the length is forever, false otherwise
